page.title: 21Greaves Hall no longer.
page.content:
Approximately 15 years ago the site was bought by Redrow Homes,except the " Hospital " which was left empty and had not been used for some years. (Private Owner) the building was vandalized, fell into disrepair, and was finally pulled down around 2009.

About 200 new homes now occupy the site, but some of the hospital houses remain after refurbishment by Redrow.

The driveway down to the Hospital is still tree lined and has daffodils on each side in springtime.

A leisure centre run by West Lancashire District Council occupies part of the site along with a new junior school. The Leisure Centre is well used by the community one of these being a group called the Nifty Fifties, formed for exercise and friendship on a doctors referal scheme.
Stuart Atkinson
